text: قَالَ سَوۡفَ أَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكُمۡ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

translation.en: He said, "I will ask forgiveness for you from my Lord. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful
translation.id: Dia (Yakub) berkata, "Aku akan memohonkan ampunan bagimu kepada Tuhanku. Sungguh, Dia Yang Maha Pengampun, Maha Penyayang
